MONGO_URL.description: Connection string for pymongo to connect to mongoDB.

KEY_CODE.description: The field name / key of the cide in the short url record.

KEY_TARGET.description: The field name / key of the target in the short url record.

KEY_TS.description: The field name / key of the used timestamp in the short url record.

HOST_URL.description: The URL of the app. Including protocol. Excluding slash.

LANDING_URL.description: The URL of the landing home page to redirect to.
